mapper.select: /* BrandCatalogMapper.xml, ID_GEN_SELECT_BRAND_ID, 브랜드ID SEQ 만들기, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2013-12-30 */ SELECT 'BR'||LPAD(SQ_DP_SHPG_BRAND.NEXTVAL, 8, '0') FROM DUAL
/* BrandCatalogMapper.xml, SELECT_COUNT_TBL_DP_MENU, 브랜드, 카탈로그 카테고리 조회, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2013-12-30 */ SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY A WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN ='Y' AND MENU_ID=#{dpCatNo}
/* BrandCatalogMapper.xml, ID_GEN_SELECT_CATALOG_ID, 카탈로그 ID SEQ 만들기, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2013-12-30 */ SELECT 'CL'||LPAD(SQ_DP_SHPG_CATALOG.NEXTVAL, 8, '0') FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: /* BrandCatalogMapper.xml, createTbDpShpgCatalog,카탈로그 정보 테이블에 INSERT, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2013-12-30 */ INSERT INTO TB_DP_SHPG_CATALOG( CATALOG_ID ,ORG_CATALOG_ID ,BRAND_ID ,CHNL_CNT ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,UPD_ID ,UPD_DT ) VALUES( #{createCatalogId} ,#{catalogId} ,#{createBrandId} ,0 ,'admin' ,SYSDATE ,'admin' ,SYSDATE )

/* BrandCatalogMapper.xml, createTbDpMenuShpgMapg,카탈로그_카테고리 매핑 테이블에 INSERT, 김형식/SK플래닛 , 2013-12-30 */ INSERT INTO TB_DP_MENU_SHPG_MAPG( MENU_ID ,CATALOG_ID ,BASE_YN ,USE_YN ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,UPD_ID ,UPD_DT ) VALUES( #{dpCatNo} ,#{createCatalogId} ,'Y' ,'Y' ,'admin' ,SYSDATE ,'admin' ,SYSDATE )
